name: Fine pâté
title: Gourmet Gold · Fine pâté · Chicken, salmon, kidney, rabbit
description: Gourmet Fine pâté Chicken, salmon, kidney, rabbit I love being spoilt for choice

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: animal meats and by-products (58% including rabbit 4%), mineral substances, by-products of plant origin, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products (58% including chicken 12%), mineral substances, by-products of plant origin, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products, fish and fish by-products (4%salmon), mineral substances, by-products of vegetable origin, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products (58%, including 10%), mineral substances, by-products of plant origin, sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: live a: 850; Vit D3: 130; MG/KG: Iron sulfate (II) Monohydrate: (Fe: 9.8); Anhydrous calcium iodate: (I: 0.24); Copper sulfate (II) Pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.80); Monohydrate manganeous sulfate: (Mn: 1.8); Sulfate of Zinc Monohydrate: (Zn: 17.6); Taurine: 530.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat loves fine pies, and you would like to offer your gourmet an even wider range of flavors? With the appetizing varieties of GOURMET Gold Fine Pies with Vegetables you can pamper the demanding palate of your cat with a taste experience at every meal. Fine pâtés with flesich or fish have been carefully prepared and enriched with delicious vegetables so that you can offer your cat a delicious meal. GOURMET Gold Fine pâté with vegetables-a great selection of tasty varieties. Every day a varied taste experience for little velvet paws.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 2 to 3 cans per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) 3 Dosen pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
